permissions.lbac-warning-service-account: Warning: This service account has full data access with no Team LBAC rules applied.
permissions.lbac-warning-team: Warning: This team has full data access with no Team LBAC rules applied.

end.description: If no end date is selected, the banner is displayed indefinitely.
end.error: End time must be after start time
end.label: Ends at

message.description: Text content of the banner. Supports markdown.
message.label: Message

start.description: The banner will be shown starting from this date/time.
start.label: Starts at

message.default: Update this preview by modifying the message field.

pdf.info-text: Export the dashboard as a PDF document
pdf.title: Export dashboard PDF
pdf.zoom-description: Zoom in to enlarge text, or zoom out to see more data (like table columns) per panel.

email-sharing.success-revoke-all-accesses-description: {{email}}'s access to all public dashboards has been successfully removed.
email-sharing.success-send-recipient-invitation: The email invitation has been sent.

errors.action-message: Please contact your Grafana administrator to install the plugin.
errors.no-renderer-description: To generate PDF reports, you must install the <2>Grafana Image Renderer</2> plugin.

errors.old-renderer-title: You are using an old version of the image renderer plugin
